directions: Place carrots, orange juice, butter, sugar and ginger in large skillet over medium-high heat. Bring to boil; cover and cook 3 minutes. Uncover and simmer until liquid glazes carrots, about 10 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: 2 pounds carrots, peeled, cut diagonally into 1/4-inch-thick rounds
title: Carrots with Ginger
